mapper.select: select (select count(id) from t_device) as deviceNum, (select count(id) from t_sys_users) as userNum, (select count(id) from t_server_tunnel) as tunnelNum, (select count(id) from t_domain where type = 2 and status = 1) as domainNum, (select count(id) from t_domain where type = 1 and status = 1) as portNum, (select count(id) from t_device_online where `status` = 1) as deviceOnlineNum from DUAL

select round(c.todayFlow,2) as todayFlow, round(ifnull((c.todayFlow-todayFlow2)/todayFlow2, IF(c.todayFlow=0, 0, 1)) * 100,2) as todayFlowOn, round(c.monthFlow,2) as monthFlow, round(ifnull(((c.monthFlow+c.todayFlow) - monthFlow2)/monthFlow2, IF((c.monthFlow+c.todayFlow)=0, 0, 1)) * 100,2) as monthFlowOn, round(c.yearFlow,2) as yearFlow, round(ifnull(((c.yearFlow+c.todayFlow) - yearFlow2)/yearFlow2, IF((c.yearFlow+c.todayFlow)=0, 0, 1)) * 100,2) as yearFlowOn, round(c.monthLink,2) monthLink, round(ifnull((c.monthLink - monthLink2)/monthLink2, IF(c.monthLink=0, 0, 1)) * 100,2) as monthLinkOn from (select (select IFNULL(sum(b.bytes_in+b.bytes_out ),0)/1024/1024 from data_metrics b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_date = CURRENT_DATE) todayFlow, (select ifnull(sum(flow),0)/1024/1024 from data_metrics_day b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')) as todayFlow2, (select ifnull(sum(flow),0)/1024/1024 from data_metrics_day b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_month = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%m-01')) as monthFlow, (select ifnull(sum(flow),0)/1024/1024 from data_metrics_day b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_month = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01')) as monthFlow2,
(select ifnull(sum(flow),0)/1024/1024 from data_metrics_day b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_year = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y')) as yearFlow, (select ifnull(sum(flow),0)/1024/1024 from data_metrics_day b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_year = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y')) as yearFlow2,
(select ifnull(sum(link),0) from data_metrics_day b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_month = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%m-01')) as monthLink, (select ifnull(sum(link),0) from data_metrics_day b where b.user_id = a.id and b.create_month = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01')) as monthLink2 from t_sys_users a WHERE a.id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.id) c

select a.device_id, ifnull(b.`name`, `未知设备`) deviceName, sum(a.bytes_in+a.bytes_out)/1024/1024 flow from data_metrics_day a left join t_device b on a.device_id = b.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
and a.create_date = CURRENT_DATE
and a.create_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.create_month = DATE_FORMAT(NOW() ,'%Y-%m-01')
and a.create_year = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y')
GROUP BY a.device_id order by flow desc
